item.title: NDC Ontario players League1 Canada alumni to feature in April women's internationals
item.description: CANWNT and CANW20 are in action from April 5 to April 9, with plenty of former Pro-Am players expected to play.
item.author: League1 Ontario staff

item.title: Vaughan travel to Simcoe in blockbuster clash during Premier Division opening weekend
item.description: The 2024 Men’s and Women’s Premier Divisions kick off with some entertaining matchups.
item.author: League1 Ontario staff

item.title: Thursday night action to kick off Championship Division
item.description: The new League1 Ontario second tier begins its inaugural season at Ron Joyce Stadium.
item.author: League1 Ontario staff

item.title: League2 Division to kick off the L1ON regular season
item.description: The new third tier will be the first division to start play in 2024.
item.author: League1 Ontario staff
